mapper.insert: insert into payment (payment_id, payment_date, payment_create_date, create_employee_code, create_employee_name, payment_amount, payment_code, payment_bank_account, payment_bank_name, checking_id, pay_source, payment_remark) values (#{payment_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payment_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payment_create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{create_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payment_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment_bank_account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment_bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checking_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pay_source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payment_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update payment set payment_date = #{payment_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payment_create_date = #{payment_create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_employee_code = #{create_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_employee_name = #{create_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_amount = #{payment_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payment_code = #{payment_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_bank_account = #{payment_bank_account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_bank_name = #{payment_bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checking_id = #{checking_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_source = #{pay_source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_remark = #{payment_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where payment_id = #{payment_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select payment_id, payment_date, payment_create_date, create_employee_code, create_employee_name, payment_amount, payment_code, payment_bank_account, payment_bank_name, checking_id, pay_source, payment_remark from payment where payment_id = #{payment_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select payment_id, payment_date, payment_create_date, create_employee_code, create_employee_name, payment_amount, payment_code, payment_bank_account, payment_bank_name, checking_id, pay_source, payment_remark from payment
